document.full_text: italian fashion house prada, which is preparing for an initial public offering of about $2 billion in hong kong, said its net profit more than doubled in 2010 and it expects further gains in the current half year.
document.title: prada point to rising profits ahead of hk ipo
lines_and_colors: italian fashion house prada, which is preparing for an initial public offering of about $2 billion in hong kong, said its net profit more than doubled in 2010 and it expects further gains in the current half year.
